abstract: Kyle T. Dolan spins us a puzzle.
snippet: Kyle T. Dolan spins us a puzzle.
lead_paragraph: TUESDAY PUZZLE — I’m not an avid television game show viewer, but a person would have to have been living under a rock not to be aware of “THE PRICE IS RIGHT.” Even so, I was only vaguely familiar with the SHOWCASE SHOWDOWN segment of the show, and wasn’t really familiar with its name. No matter; I thought that the setup for Kyle T. Dolan’s puzzle today was interesting and that kept me going, even if the puzzle itself didn’t solve “like a Tuesday” for me.
